mapper.select: SELECT gp.g_name AS goodsName ,u.m_id AS memberId ,gp.g_price AS goodsPrice ,b.pay_ok_date AS payOkDate ,gp.laundry_code AS laundryCode ,l.laundry_name AS laundryName ,b.pay_method AS payMethod FROM tb_user AS u INNER join tb_order AS o on u.user_code = o.user_code INNER join tb_bill AS b on o.user_code = b.user_code INNER join tb_ilban_g_price AS gp on gp.ilban_G_price_code = o.ilban_G_price_code INNER JOIN tb_laundry AS l on l.laundry_code = gp.laundry_code where u.m_id = #{memberId} LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};
